en.uvodnyNadpis: Technical support for environmentally friendly solutions.
en.popisMapa: Spatial database of projects we have collaborated on.
en.popisPodkladoveModely:
Creation of the model of the area of interest;
Compatibility with tools like Cadna, AtmoPlan, and others as needed;
Modeling of current and future state based on reference drawings;
en.popisTepelnyOstrov:
Creation of a model of the current landscape structure of the area of interest;
Modeling and calibration of the current and future state based on base maps and documentation;
Calculation and analysis of the urban heat island for the current and future state of the area of interest;
en.popisNoiseSolver:
Software for processing sound recordings from CEM and BrÃ¼el & KjÃ¦r measuring instruments;
Cutting, Shifting, Exporting, Graph creation;
Real-time calculation of LAeq and frequency graph while working with the recording;
en.popisProgramovanie:
Software tool development tailored to specific requirements;
Automation of company processes;
en.popisKlimatickaZmena:
Development of a Climate Change Adaptation Study according to SAÅ½P methodology;
Project assessment, Proposal of measures;
The study serves as an effective argumentation tool when communicating with the public;
en.popisTvorbaWebstranok:
Custom website creation;
Design, text, animation, and functionality consultation;
Website deployment and launch;
en.popisExportMap:
Bulk export of maps according to requirements;
Programming of bulk legend adjustments for raster layers and subsequent export of map compositions to the selected format;
Consultation on layout arrangement and design;
en.indexNadpis1: Sustainable Development Based on Accurate Data
en.indexText1: The world around us is changing, and so are the challenges we face in the field of environmental protection. We believe that high-quality data, accurate models, and thorough technical support are the key to effective sustainable planning and a considerate approach to our environment.
en.indexText1-1: We provide services that connect science, technology, and ecological values. Our goal is to support ecologically appropriate projects not only technically, but also ideologically â€“ with respect for nature and the people who live in it.
en.indexText2: Modern development requires more than just quality architecture â€“ it also needs a deep understanding of the environment it enters. We offer technical support that helps developers, designers, and planners integrate environmental aspects already in the early planning phases. Our aim is to support construction that is technically well-thought-out, environmentally responsible, and prepared for future challenges.
en.indexText3: Many years of experience in providing technical support for environmentally focused solutions are reflected in a wide range of realized collaborations across various sectors.
en.textPodkladoveModely:
ğŸ—ºï¸ Precisely crafted terrain models ready for use in simulation software, tailored to your specific requirements.
We offer high-quality, accurate digital base models compatible with tools such as CadnaA, AtmoPlan, SoundPLAN, IMMI, and more. This service is designed for companies and professionals working on acoustic, emission, transport, or urban planning studies.
ğŸ”§ What does the service include?
âœ… Creation of a detailed model of the area of interest
A comprehensive 2D/3D model including:
Digital terrain model (elevation data)
Building polygons with height attributes
Road, railway, and tram line geometries
Parking lot polygons and other urban features
Additional objects as specified by the client
âœ… Modeling of current and future conditions
The base model is created using publicly available data (e.g., OpenStreetMap, INSPIRE, ZBGIS). Planned developments are integrated into this base using provided drawings (.DWG, .DXF, .PDF, etc.).
âœ… Drawing adjustment and georeferencing
If the provided drawings are not correctly aligned in space, we handle their adjustmentâ€”rotation, scaling, and accurate geolocation. We use them to create new object layers for the future model.
âœ… Compatibility with professional software
Output data is prepared according to the requirements of software such as:
CadnaA (noise modeling)
AtmoPlan (emission calculations)
SoundPLAN, IMMI
or other tools as requested
ğŸ¯ The result is faster study processing without delays caused by data preparation.
ğŸ“© Contact us to get a model tailored exactly to your project needs.
en.textTepelnyOstrov:
How does the urban environment affect the microclimateâ€”and what can you do about it?
We help cities, municipalities, designers, and investors understand how urbanization contributes to local overheating, and identify specific solutions that improve quality of life in cities.
ğŸ›°ï¸ Analysis of current and future conditions
We combine spatial data, meteorological inputs, and shadow analyses to model the actual thermal load of a specific areaâ€”as experienced by its residents on the hottest days of the year.
ğŸ” Whatâ€™s included in the analysis?
Evaluation of current surface types, vegetation, and urban structure
Modeling of future scenarios (new development, revitalization, greenery, shading elements, etc.)
Calculation of surface temperature differences between current and proposed states
Consideration of key heat flows affecting the microclimate (radiation, conduction, evaporation, heat accumulation in materials)
ğŸŒ¡ï¸ Benefits for your project:
Identification of urban heat islands and their causes
Informed decision-making for designing shading elements, greenery, or water features
Expert input for EIA, spatial planning, or urban climate strategies
Visual results in map form to support public communication
ğŸ“ˆ The result is a clear, professional analysis to help you design a more resilient and healthier urban environment.
en.textNoiseSolver:
